targets.query: SELECT "usage_idle" *-1+100 AS "Total" FROM "autogen"."cpu" WHERE ("Alias" =~ /^$Alias$/ AND "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"

SELECT mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as "system", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT mean(total) AS "total", mean(used) as "used"  FROM "autogen"."disk" WHERE ("Alias" =~ /^$Alias$/ AND "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "path" =~ /^$FileSystem$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT ( "inodes_used" / "inodes_total" ) * 100 FROM "disk" WHERE ("Alias" =~ /^$Alias$/ AND "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "path" =~ /^$FileSystem$/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "path"

SELECT mean(tcp_close) as CLOSED, mean(tcp_close_wait) as CLOSE_WAIT, mean(tcp_closing) as CLOSING, mean(tcp_established) as ESTABLISHED, mean(tcp_fin_wait1) as FIN_WAIT1, mean(tcp_fin_wait2) as FIN_WAIT2, mean(tcp_last_ack) as LAST_ACK, mean(tcp_syn_recv) as SYN_RECV, mean(tcp_syn_sent) as SYN_SENT, mean(tcp_time_wait) as TIME_WAIT FROM "netstat" WHERE ("Alias" =~ /^$Alias$/ AND "host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean(tcp_close) as CLOSED, mean(tcp_close_wait) as CLOSE_WAIT, mean(tcp_closing) as CLOSING, mean(tcp_established) as ESTABLISHED, mean(tcp_fin_wait1) as FIN_WAIT1, mean(tcp_fin_wait2) as FIN_WAIT2, mean(tcp_last_ack) as LAST_ACK, mean(tcp_syn_recv) as SYN_RECV, mean(tcp_syn_sent) as SYN_SENT, mean(tcp_time_wait) as TIME_WAIT FROM "netstat" WHERE ("Alias" =~ /^$Alias$/ AND "host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean(tcp_close) as CLOSED, mean(tcp_close_wait) as CLOSE_WAIT, mean(tcp_closing) as CLOSING, mean(tcp_established) as ESTABLISHED, mean(tcp_fin_wait1) as FIN_WAIT1, mean(tcp_fin_wait2) as FIN_WAIT2, mean(tcp_last_ack) as LAST_ACK, mean(tcp_syn_recv) as SYN_RECV, mean(tcp_syn_sent) as SYN_SENT, mean(tcp_time_wait) as TIME_WAIT FROM "netstat" WHERE ("Alias" =~ /^$Alias$/ AND "host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

SELECT derivative(first("bytes_recv"), 1s) AS "bytes_recv" FROM "net" WHERE ("Alias" =~ /^$Alias$/ AND "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$Network_Ethernet$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative("tcp_estabresets", 1s) AS "estabresets" FROM "autogen"."net" WHERE ("Alias" =~ /^$Alias$/ AND "host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT non_negative_derivative("tcp_outrsts", 1s) AS "outrsts" FROM "autogen"."net" WHERE ("Alias" =~ /^$Alias$/ AND "host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT non_negative_derivative("tcp_activeopens", 1s) AS "activeopens" FROM "autogen"."net" WHERE ("Alias" =~ /^$Alias$/ AND "host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT non_negative_derivative("tcp_passiveopens", 1s) AS "passiveopens" FROM "autogen"."net" WHERE ("Alias" =~ /^$Alias$/ AND "host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = Alias
list.name: Alias
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = Alias

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = host where Alias =~ /$Alias/
list.name: hostname
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = host where Alias =~ /$Alias/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "cpu" WHERE host =~/$hostname/ and Alias =~ /$Alias/
list.name: Cpu
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "cpu" WHERE host =~/$hostname/ and Alias =~ /$Alias/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~/$hostname/ and Alias =~ /$Alias/
list.name: Network_Ethernet
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~/$hostname/ and Alias =~ /$Alias/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "path" WHERE host =~/$hostname/ and Alias =~ /$Alias/
list.name: FileSystem
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "path" WHERE host =~/$hostname/ and Alias =~ /$Alias/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diskio" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE host =~/$hostname/ and Alias =~ /$Alias/
list.name: Disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diskio" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE host =~/$hostname/ and Alias =~ /$Alias/
